title: Can someone translate Punjabi lyrics to English? “Oh jeeyo bai, Sunya a god ohne le laya ni, bacha aakh de bandook da Siyane kehnde, khare pair katal karaa deve Bhi roula watt de mashooq da” (Source: “Jatt fire karda” song) - Quora

response.answer_text: I won’t regard myself as somebody with amazing translation skills, but I’ll just try. I hope somebody will offer a better translation. Till the, “Amazing bro, may you live long! We’ve heard he got (referred as Adopted) a new mini gun.” “Wise men say that disputes of land and love (referred as mistress/female lover) results in immediate murders.”
